entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
